text:
[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Game:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[A] [(2)] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Game:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your ::Game:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[C] All of your Opponent's Characters gain "[A] ENCORE [(2)]".
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2500 Power for the turn.
[C] For each of your other ::Game:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[C] For each of your other Back Row ::Game:: Characters, this gains +2500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your ::Game:: Characters.

[C] This cannot be chosen as target of Opponent's effects.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your ::Game:: Characters.
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[A] When this is placed from your hand to your Climax Zone, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room whose Level is equal to or lower than your Level and return it to hand, and select up to 2 Characters and those Characters receive +1 Soul for the turn.

[C] During your turn, all your other "Kaede Honjou, Hates Being Hurt" gain +2000 Power.
[A] BOND "Kaede Honjou, Hates Being Hurt" [(1)]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [(1)] Choose 1 of your Opponent's Front Row Characters, and that Character gets -1000 Power for the turn.

[A] At the beginning of your Main Phase, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.
[A] When this attacks, if you have 4 or more cards in your hand, for the turn this gains +3000 Power.
--None--

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, if you have a ::Game:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[S] [(2) Rest this] Choose a ::Game:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] When this attacks, if you have another ::Game:: Character, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] CX COMBO [(2) Discard 2 cards from hand to the Waiting Room] This ability activates up to once per turn. At the end of this card's Attack, if "Road Leading to the Second Layer" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, Stand this.

For the turn give all of your ::Game:: Characters the following ability. "[A] [(1)] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand."
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Level 1 or lower Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of your other Character becomes Reversed, this gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Loving Sacrifice" is in the Climax Zone, and you have 4 or more other ::Game:: Characters, until the next end of your Opponent's turn this gains +2500 Power and the following ability. "[C] The card Opposite this gets -2 Soul."

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 4 or more other ::Game:: Characters, you may choose a ::Game:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it in your Stock.
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. During the turn this is placed from hand to the Stage, when the Damage dealt by this is Cancelled, put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X = 1 + Level of that card. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] During your Opponent's turn, this gains +4000 Power.
[S] [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] Look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 1 ::Game:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax card, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room."

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times Soul of that Character.
[S] [(1)] Choose 1 of your ::Game:: Characters, and that Character gains +1 Soul for the turn.

[A] When "Maple Tree" is placed to your Climax Zone, if this is in your Front Row, you may choose a Level X or lower Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand. X equals the number of "Maple Tree" in your Waiting Room.
[A] RESONATE [Reveal any number of "Maple, Loving Sacrifice" from your hand] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, until the next end of your Opponent's turn this gains +X Power. X equals the number of cards revealed times 1500.

[C] During your turn, for each of your other ::Game:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] CX COMBO This ability activates up to once per turn. When this card's Damage is cancelled, if "King of Destruction" is in your Climax Zone, you may choose up to 1 ::Game:: Character in your Waiting Room, put it to Stock, and reveal the top card of your Library. If the revealed card is a ::Game:: Character, put it in your hand. (Otherwise put it back)

[C] During your turn, for each of your other ::Game:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When your Opponent Levels Up, if "King of Destruction" is in your Climax Zone and this is in your Front Row, you may choose up to 1 ::Game:: Character in your Waiting Room, put it to Stock, and reveal the top card of your Library. If the revealed card is a ::Game:: Character, put it in your hand. (Otherwise put it back)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 1 Character from your hand whose Level is equal to or lower than your Level, place it to any Slot on the Stage, and for the turn, that Character gains +2000 Power.
[A] [(2)] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gain the following ability for the turn. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this Character's Damage is cancelled, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent." (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose a card from among them, place it on top of your Library, and put the remaining cards in your Waiting Room.
[A] When the Damage of this card is Cancelled, you may return the top card of your Stock to your hand.

[A] When this attacks, reveal the top card of your Library. If that card is Level 1 or higher, choose 1 of your other Characters, Rest it, and move it to an empty slot in the Back Row. [Climax Cards are considered to be Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back)

[A] [Discard 2 ::Game:: Characters from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 from among them, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards to Stock in any order.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another ::Game:: Character, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your other ::Game:: Characters and return it to your hand.

[C] This cannot Side Attack.
[A] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Climax card in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] [(1)] When a Climax is placed in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 Level 1 or higher card from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and discard the remaining cards to the Waiting Room. (Climax cards are considered to be Level 0 for this effect)
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters, send it to Memory, then your Opponent places that Character from Memory to any slot on their Stage.
[C] During your turn this gains +4000 Power.

[A] When the Battle Opponent of your other Character becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your ::Game:: Characters, and that Character gains +3000 Power for the turn.
[A] CX COMBO [Put a "Iz Workshop" from your Climax Zone to the Waiting Room] During your Encore Step, you may pay cost. If so, choose up to 2 ::Game:: Characters in any order from your Waiting Room and place them to Stock.
--None--
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your Opponent's Front Row Characters, and for the turn that Character gets -3000 Power.

[C] If there is at least 1 Marker under this, this gains +3500 Power and +1 Soul.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose a "May, Twin Girl" in your Waiting Room and put it face-up under this as Marker.

[A] [(2)] When you use the BACKUP of this, you may pay cost. If so, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[C] All of your other "Yui, Extreme Swing" gain +3000 Power.
[C] All of your other "May, Extreme Swing" gain +3000 Power.

[A] When this attacks, if the Level of the Character Opposite this is 3 or higher, this gains +6000 Power for the turn.
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this becomes Reversed in battle, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 2 or higher, you may Rest this. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

All of your Characters gain the following ability for the turn. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this card's Damage is cancelled, you may deal 1 Damage to your Opponent." (Damage Cancel may occur)
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] You may play your Climax cards without meeting the color requirement.
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When your Climax is placed in the Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, draw a card.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 ::Game:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Game:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Stopped Being Ordinary" is in your Climax Zone, of you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Game:: Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and discard the remaining cards to the Waiting Room. X equals the number of your Opponent's Characters.

[A] When this attacks, if you have 1 or fewer other Characters, you may put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If it's a Level 0 or lower Character, put it in any Slot in the Back Row.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[A] [Discard a "Maple, Loving Sacrifice" from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, return all cards in your Waiting Room to the Library, and shuffle your Library.
[S] [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] If you are Level 3 or higher, choose a Character with "Maple" in name from your hand and place it to any slot on your Stage.

[A] [(1) Discard a ::Game:: Character from your hand to the Waiting Room, send this to Memory] When this is Reversed in Battle, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 card from among them, add it to hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[C] You cannot play Events or BACKUP from hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room, and this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of ::Game:: Characters among those cards.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, put X cards from the bottom of your Opponent's Library into the Waiting Room. X equals the number of your ::Game:: Characters.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 3000, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] EXPERIENCE If the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 6 or higher, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] CX COMBO [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "The Blue in your Eyes" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, deal X Damage to your Opponent, and for the turn this gains +2000 Power. X equals the Level of the card discarded by the cost of this ability. (Climax Cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If it's a ::Game:: Character, you may move this to an empty Slot in the Front Row.
[A] ACCELERATE [Put the top card of your Library to Clock] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, until the next end of your Opponent's turn this gains +2000 Power.

[C] ASSIST All your Level 3 or higher Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose a "Syrup, Awaken" in your Waiting Room and put it face-up under this as Marker.
[S] [(1) Discard a Character from hand to the Waiting Room] Choose a "Syrup, Awaken" from this card's Marker and place it to any slot of your Stage. At the end of this turn, you may place that Character face-up underneath this as Marker.

[C] If you have 2 or more ::Game:: Characters, this gains +1 Level and cannot be chosen by your Opponent's abilities.
[A] When this attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your other ::Game:: Characters.

[C] If "Sally, Super Speed" is in your Clock, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] If all your Characters are ::Game::, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose 1 ::Game:: Character in your Clock and put it on the bottom of your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 1 or lower, put it in your Stock. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose 1 of your Opponent's Level 3 or lower Characters and put it in their Waiting Room. If so, your Opponent chooses up to 1 Cost 0 or lower Character in their Waiting Room and places it to the same slot on their Stage.

[A] CX COMBO When "If Something's Troublesome, Eat It" is placed to your Climax Zone, if you have 5 or less Stock, all of your Characters gain the following ability for the turn. "[A] [(1)] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step."
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your Opponent's Front Row Characters, and for the turn that Character gets -1000 Power.

[A] This ability activates up to twice per turn. When your other ::Game:: Character is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[A] During your turn, when the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.

[C] You may have as many copies of cards with the same name as this in your deck.
[C] For each of your other "Sally, Shadow Clone" in the Front Row, this gains +2000 Power.

[A] [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] When your other ::Game:: Character is Front Attacked, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +2500 Power for the turn.
[A] ENCORE [Put the top card of your Library in your Clock]
[A] [(1)] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Sally, Relaxation" in your Waiting Room and put it Rested in the Slot this was in.

[A] When this attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your Opponent's Characters.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, you cannot use "[A] ENCORE" for the turn. (This includes "[A] ENCORE [(3)]" provided by rules)
--None--

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 4 or more other ::Game:: Characters, you may choose a ::Game:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it in your Stock.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of the Opponent, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[Counter] Perform the following action twice. "Choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains the following ability. '[C] The Character Opposite this gets -1 Soul.'"
Send this to Memory.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[A] When this is placed from hand to your Climax Zone, choose up to 1 Character with a Soul Trigger Icon, return it to your hand, choose up to 2 of your Characters and for the turn they gain +1 Soul.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Climax Zone, choose up to 1 Level 1 or lower Character in your Waiting Room, put it to Stock, and for the turn all of your Characters gains +1 Soul.

[C] Your other Level 0 or lower Front Row Center Character gains +1000 Power.

[A] CX COMBO [Discard a "Maple, Walking Fortress" from hand to the Waiting Room, put a "Confrontation Between Guildmasters" from your Climax Zone to the Waiting Room] At the beginning of your Attack Phase, if this is in your Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, choose up to 1 of your other ::Game:: Characters, Stand it, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] If all your Characters are ::Game::, this gains +3000 Power.
[A] When this Direct Attacks, you may choose a ::Game:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it to Stock.

[A] [Put this in the Waiting Room] When your other Character is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, if this is in the Back Row, you may pay cost. If so, place that Character Rested in the slot it was in.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose a Character in your Opponent's Front Row, and that Character gets -1000 Power for the turn.

[S] [Rest this] Put a Marker from under this in your Stock.

If so, Stand this card. (This is also activated if placed on the Stage by the Standby icon of "Guildmaster of Kingdom of the Flame Emperor" when revealed as a Trigger Check)

X equals the sum of the Levels of the cards placed into the Waiting Room by this effect. (Climax Cards are considered Level 0 for this effect)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another ::Game:: Character, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] [(1)] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, your Opponent places all of their Stock in their Waiting Room, then puts the same number of cards from the top of their Library to Stock.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Deploy - Left Hand" is in your Climax Zone, put the bottom 4 cards of your Opponent's Library in their Waiting Room and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X is the number of Climax cards among those cards. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library and put them on top of your Library in any order.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, your Opponent declares 0, 1, 2, or 3. Put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room, and if the Level of the card put in the Waiting Room this way is the same as the number your Opponent declared, draw up to X cards. X = 1 + the number your Opponent declared. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect)

[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax with a Gate (Pants) Trigger Icon, you may draw a card. If you do, choose a card in your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Game:: Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +1500 Power.

[A] When your Climax is placed in the Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 6 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. If there is a Climax with a Book Trigger Icon among them, choose a ::Game:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, if you have a ::Game:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1000, Level 1 [Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Level 1 or higher Characters, your Opponent chooses a Level X or lower Character in their Waiting Room, and swap them. X equals the Level of the Character you chose -1.

[A] CX COMBO When "Duel System" is placed to your Climax Zone, this is in your Front Row, and you have another "Frederica, Information Warfare", reveal the top card of your Library.
